content.detailedDescription: I went outside one night working on a theory that ufo's communicate by light. i have bracelets that light up, so i went out side at night with my bracelets turned on. i thought that night would be a good night to investigate because the air that night smelled almost metallic. after a while, i started to get a very uneasy feeling and went inside and went to bed. when i woke up, there was a very tall being in my bedroom. i couldn't see a face, i think it may have been wearing some kind of helmet. despite its height it seemed frail, its arms were long, but skinny and its head was very large despite the rest of its body being slender. it used my mothers voice to speak, and it told me i had to come with it, and i asked it why. it simply reiterated the fact that i had to come with it, but this time its voice didn't sound so much like my mothers, it had a robotic undertone to it. i asked it where we would have been going and it just said "i need you to come to my base with me" i still didn't want to go, and was trying to find a reason to give it so i didn't have to go, so i asked where its base was and it said "its not underground" so i told it i couldn't go with it because it wasn't underground. up until that point i wasn't afraid of it, it was just like i was having a normal conversation, but the last time i said no it was like it suddenly got angry with me, like i had flipped a switch. i don't remember anything else for a while. then i was back in my bedroom and i was sick, i was dry heaving, i had a headache, my voice was incredibly sore and i kept coughing. i checked my phone and it was about 2:30 when i went to bed at 12 midnight. the things i remember most about the entity was that it was tall enough to have to stoop inside my room. it appeared to be wearing white clothing, almost like a robe but not quite. there seemed to be a kind of glow coming from behind it,like a white light. i was 16 when it happened and now i'm 17. its taken me a long time to get the courage to submit my story.
content.summary: No ufo sighted, being appeared in bedroom

content.detailedDescription: I perfer not to explain my sighting here. i do not feel safe.
content.summary: They are the clouds

content.detailedDescription: During the summer of 1995 a group of neighborhood kids were playing outside during the night, it was between the hours of 12 pm to 2 am. we were playing a war game where one team hid and the other team would search. i included this because i felt the object was watching or recording our behavior.  during the game i captured a player from the opposite team and lashed his hands behind his back, of course the kid resisted trying to get away.  because of this he fell on his back, his head facing towards the south and feet towards the north. i proceeded to pick him up when he objected. he became very disturbed asking me what "that was" he said look up there. i thought he was just trying to get away but he insisted i look.  this is when things became very strange. i looked and to my utter amazement just above our house was a pitch black triangular object.  i released the other kid and we called everyone over. the object hung from the sky without movement, without sound. it had no visible lights and blended with the night sky almost perfectly however a few of us where carrying flash lights and used them to look at the object. the object almost seemed to absorb the light not completely but more than one would expect.  it hung there for several minutes, no sound no movement.  i got the idea to get my compound bow from the house and take a shot at the object. i quickly retrieved it and loaded an arrow. i pointed the bow at the object still no movement or sound.  i began to draw my bow when the object turned away with a slight spin. this caused me to put the bow down. all the while a few other kids where still pointing flash lights at the object. it then start to move.  to the north about 40 feet then stopped.  it spun again towards the east. then it shot like a bolt of light into the east sky.
content.summary: Pitch black triangular object, thickness of 5 feet, surface un - smooth

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home, a few miles from buckley air force base, and saw an orb high in the sky above some houses.  i grabbed my camera and started to film it.  it caught my eye because it didn't seem to be moving, and it wasn't sparkling like a star, so i knew it was something else... it hovered, then began to move, leaving a trail behind, although it was neither moving across the sky nor in any direction, but seemed, however, to be staying in one spot.

it was very exciting, and a bit nerve-wracking.  since i was only a few miles from buckley air force base, it made me suspect that it was a tr-3b.  unfortunately i turned to look at my phone and when i looked back the object was gone. 

the video can be viewed here:  [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Witnessed an amber orb in the sky over aurora, colorado

content.detailedDescription: I was taken and i met these human like entitys i got scared but they talked to me and i was given special powers i have what you can say is super strength my speed is incredible i jumped 45 feet today i can hear hear voices in my head i dont nnow whats going on im scared what i remember from last night is me sitting on a table and it said you are hope for earth theyre coming soon and we will help you hybrid 1 im scared i dont know what to do i hurt a security gaurd i punch him and he flew away i cant control myself why is this happening :(
content.summary: I was ubducted and i have been given a gift

content.detailedDescription:
I was inside my house in the restroom with nausea for unknown reason 
i heard my name being called by my 2 family members in a panicked voice
one of them had come back from an errand and noticed it in the sky upon entering the house. when i came out of the restroom i thought something was terribly wrong because of the way they were calling my name and i was immediately panicked i walked out of the sliding glass door to see my two family members looking up and i said "what happened? whats wrong?"
i was told to look up at the sky and i instantly noticed and object moving side to side and up and down sometime stopping ...Seemed random and also the lights i will never forget theses lights the colors where red,purple,green and the most beautiful colors i have ever seen i cant properly explain myself as i type this i am still a bit shaken up and not sure exactly how to process what just happened to me.....I stared at the lights that were attached to this object for approximately 5 minutes? i was asked to go and get my phone to take a picture and i immediately said "no i dont wanna miss this!" and i could see that at certain times there was a pulse? or beam of light that came out of the object when i saw the green .....The colors where so beautiful .......I just stared into them amazed and absolutely stunned by what i was seeing and it was close no more than a mile away ....It was close very close , my relative did take a picture of the object but for some reason it did not show up on the picture hardly at all ......We watched it dim ? and then get brighter and move around in very, strange random patterns flashing lights .....Almost changing shape or maybe because it was turning so much i don't know  ....Then it stopped in mid air and something lit up underneath it ...A very bright orange ball of light directly underneath it and it started coming down from the sky very slowly , my relative actually jumped in his car and went to look for it that it was so close .......After seeing those lights , i felt very strange for aprox. 30 min to an hour but did notice that the nausea i was experiencing earlier that night was gone ....However when i would blink i would still see the green light in my vision ...The green light was somehow what really stood out most to me ....Its been a few days since i witnessed this ....And i seriously don't know  how to explain what's going on with me , i feel different somehow ...Some sort of clarity ? ....Along with being very very confused ......And i am not sure who to talk to about this besides the two other witnesses i told my gf and i think that i made myself sound crazy lol....So i found you guys ....I hope this helps someone out there somehow ....This is in no way a joke or a hoax and what i saw was not an airplane, helicopter or anything of the sort .........
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed ufo landing in kapaau hawaii

content.detailedDescription: I was up late and couldn't sleep so i decided to drive to the gas station and get something to drink. i was driving down a straight road with an open field to the right and i glanced over at what i thought were several helicopters flying in a formation,( blackhawks and chino will often fly in pairs over town), but noticed that they were flying pretty low. at this point i rolled down my windows and slowed down as it flew in front of me and to my left. it was travelling about 10-15 mph as it flew in front and to the left there is a neighborhood. as it reached over the neighborhood it seemed to hover over the houses with a circular path. the front 2/3 of the craft was in the shae that resembled the hr71 blackbird and the back end looked like it had some sort of stabilizers, it was only visible from the lights on it. there were five lights 3 white lights one on the front area and two on the back which rendered it to appear as a triangle, and two red lights on the belly that reminded me of those 70s dome cop lights that stick to the roof. the lights spun at approx 1 revolution every 2 seconds and one spun clockwise and the other counter clockwise.  i felt bizarre as anyone would seeing something that i had not seen before and was unable to identify it.  i slowed down and took video. after taking about a minute of video it had moved on from that neighborhood to another about 100 feet away from it. so i sped up to turn and follow it but by then it had bizarrely reached approximately a distance of about 3/4 of a mile then i turned again to head in the direction but by the time i turned i couldn't see it anymore. the video i took unfortunately was like a cliche with ufo recordings, shaky and not very clear. i wish i had of stopped the car
content.summary: Dark, ovular, triangular object with white and red lights in mansfield

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside with the telescope pointing at the south eastern sky when i saw something blot out the stars in a sw direction, i watched as three lights in a triangular pattern passed very high overy my home. it moved very fast (faster tahn a jet) and vanished as it approached the ne horizon.
no sound was heard as it flew over it's flight path. it was very large.
it flew from the area of the akron canton airport to the ne. i am very used to seeing jets traverse this area , but this was no airplane no engine noise and no blinking lights. it had three lights in a triangler
pattern that were very dim.The whole event lasted about 20 seconds. never seen anthing move that fast in the sky. wish i had my dslr pointed in that area of the sky instead of to my scope.
content.summary: Vehicle traveled very fast covering stars as it passed over area

content.detailedDescription: Went to bed, fell asleep and then my eyes opened a little and i seemed drugged and when i looked up i notice a round window in front of me about 3 feet off the floor and noticed 3 rolls of paper about 2 1/2 feet long under the window. the window seemed thick and about 3 foot dia and all i seen was black. i went to turn my head towards the left to see where i was and it seemed like i was in a high back lounge chair on the floor. when i looked to the left the walls were round and had beams like ancient greek style lines that turn different ways with rivets and the color was an electric blue and seemed powder coated and lit very dim.(attached drawing) and the room seemed like it was about 2o feet in dia. when i turn a little further to the left i seen another window the same size, outside the window was black and i seen a white light and then i knew it was the sun and i started to feel high anxiety because i knew i was in space. then i noticed a man on the left side of the window and he looked like a 30 year old guy with long hair and he seemed concerned, i asked him if anything was wrong and he said everything is ok, and sort of said i am just making sure no ships hit us. then he asked me something like "do you want to go somewhere with him" and i got scared and said i just want to go home and in an instant my eyes opened. i am just writing to you because i never had a dream this clear and i never knew the sun looked like a white light from space until i searched for pictures after this happened and also that the window in from of me was total black, but the other side i seen the sun and i seen in detail. i would really like to know if other people seen what i described. i did not see the outside.
content.summary: Interior of ufo

content.detailedDescription: three of us just had dinner.  we walked to the cars and to the east we saw flash of light. on the "crest" in albuquerque, nm we see a reflected light off something.  it was many miles away, but the setting sun reflected off the surface causing us to see it.  my friend got his binoculars and looked. he said it was a "crown". i took a look myself. the surface was like gold foil, it had blue, green type "window"s. but the biggest thing for me was how the surface rippled. compared to the tv towers it was near, it was probably about 100ft in length. it was situated down on a ledge to the right of the towers. we observed this for about 40 minutes. we got in our cars and were going to head toward the "crest" but as we went around a curve it disappeared from the ledge. i didn't see it go. one minute it was there and the next it wasn't.
content.summary: Gold foil object on the "crest" near tv towers, like a "crown", me and two others witness,

content.detailedDescription: I looked out my first floor bathroom window and was looking at the stars. i noticed this object (that i originally thought was a star) start moving west to east. then in a matter of seconds, it was gone. this was a totally unabstructed view. i have seen similar events before, i see what looks like an airplane with its landing lights on, (the buffalo airport is only about 60 miles away.) usually flying south to north, these objects appear to get dimmer, but if observed carefully, they are getting higher. they get so high, they can't be seen. there is no flashing, just a solid white light.
content.summary: Thought i was looking at a star, object started to move then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I got a call from ****** and ****** that there were lights in the sky changing from red to white hovering and moving. i promised ****** i would go outside and take a look and i went into the dark field across the street from me here on borden st. and what did i end up seeing? i saw these same lights and the best part was i had someone else there who saw the same things as me. i also saw one of the lights move towards and almost meet up with another light. i hope people with good cameras get out there now and shoot the night sky cuz something in our sky tonight is not normal. i made sure to message the sarnia observer to tell them they might want to have a photographer go take a look at the night sky. for the record the sky is very clear tonight and you can see everything. stars are in the sky and are all white. these objects we are seeing are definitely not stars and sure as heck don't look like any planes i have seen before and based on the time line that ****** and ****** saw them to when i and another guy saw them if they were planes they would have been long gone by the time i got out to the field. i sent a message to the university of western ontario telling their observatory to take a look at the sky tonight in sarnia if they could. they have a facebook page for the observatory.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red & white lights in the sky hovering and moving in sarnia on canada on march 30, 2014

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home westbound on i70 passing near the airport when i noticed something in the sky.  we (i was with  my 17 and 12 year old daughters) were very near the airport but this wasn't an airplane.  as we got closer to it, i asked one of my daughters "what is that?"  it was a v shaped object in the sky but it wasn't moving.  it had lights on it around the point of the v or at the point.  i was actually severely lacking sleep at the time so i kept asking my daughter what is that?  she kept saying she didn't know.  the only reason we could see it aside from the lights on the object was because the object was darker in color than the sky.  the lights were not beaming they were just on.  i picked up my phone and called my husband and asked him how fast an airplane had to go in order to maintain any altitude in the sky because this wasn't moving.  my other daughter then said she saw a plane.  it was moving.  when i got off the phone with my husband i kept asking my daughters what that was.  my 12 year old kept saying she didn't know but that she knew for sure the one thing was an airplane.  i said then what was the other thing?  she said i don't know.  so i said when i was on the phone you know for a fact that the one thing was an airplane she said yes.  i said then what was the other thing?  she said i don't know.  

the lights i saw were also round in shape i do not recall how many lights there were.  i also can not remember exactly what direction the object was in the sky, i know it was not up and down but could have been horizontal but somehow i could see the lights and feel like they were on the bottom or underside of the object.

i pulled up some pictures tonight and had my 17 year old look at them because i saw something that looked very similar to what i'd seen.  i asked her to look at the pictures and she pointed out exactly what i thought looked like what we'd seen.  when i tried to get my 12 year old to look she refused and ran out of the room and avoids anything and everything to do with this.  i don't know why.

because i was so tired i didn't do what i would have done had i been thinking clearly and that would have been to pull over on the interstate and take pictures (it wasn't that busy on the road) and i'd have watched it.

i hope it happens again but what i'd really like to know is if anyone else has reported it.
content.summary: My 2 daughters and i observed something in the air and it was not an airplane

content.detailedDescription:
I have a photo i would like to submit.  i did not see the object until i looked at the photo.  at the time, my camera had some internal debris that caused round blurs on the photos.  i have since had it cleaned by the manufacturer.  anyway, i was using adobe to take out the dark spots.  i thought this object was one of the dark spots made by my camera.  when i looked closer, it looked like a solid object rather than a blur.  it was probably six months after taking the photo that i noticed the object.  you will see the object in the upper right qaudrant of the photo.

i took a series of prints.  this is the only one to survive.  the rest were stored on an external storage device that failed.  the device was sent to the manufacturer in hopes of retrieving the photos but they could not be saved.  the storage device was sent before i found the object in this photo.  my husband and i wanted the photos of our trip to hawaii.  unfortunately, they were lost.

i do not know if this is anything you might be interested in or not.  i have been thinking about sending it to you for a while but have never gotten around to it until now.  i hope it is useful. 

we were on the north side of mauna kea on the mana road, looking south.  the observatories were visible that day. the skies were unusually clear that day.

my husband and i (ages 68 and 59) have been visiting the big island for the last 15 years or so.  we go for four weeks every year, if not longer.  our family has a condominium in keauhou.
content.summary: Found object in a photo (supplied).

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed the lights as i was just star gazing, and looking for satellites. i noticed several red and white stationary strobe lights in several locations, on several occasions. one night in particular i was watching one that seemed brighter than usual. suddenly the light source moved quickly from south to north. as it moved the reason for the unusual brightness was evident. a very bright white light remained in place, and illuminated for 2 to 5 seconds. it was shut off and disappeared, but as it shut down it was reminiscent of an incandescent light being shut off. nothing but a void remained. (no ambient light behind that spot was visible).
the lights appear from time to time usually in the same area, but others appear nearly daily. these are not airliners or smaller aircraft... i do not own a camera capable of recording these events but they are genuine sighings of unusual unknown flying objects.
content.summary: Stationary flashing lights several different sources. and....

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and saw two blinking red lights in the sky and thought that it was a low plane because the dupage county airport is nearby. then i thought it was two planes flying side by side. i pulled off on a side street and put my window down and stuck my head out and noticed the dark outline of the triangular figure. it looked almost like a b2 stealth bomber. i couldn't see the whole figure against the dark sky but i could see the flashing red lights on the base of the triangular figure. the object made no noise as it flew slowly northwest. i lost sight of the object behind the trees and houses after about 3 minutes.
content.summary: Dark triangular object with red flashing lights on base of triangle

content.detailedDescription: I have had many ufo sightings in the past 10 years. witch are what i believe to be as real as it gets! my sighting could only be more if a space being knock at my door. i have no pictures. the object that i have seen does not come from earth. my sightings have all been entry in and out of earths atmosphere. and all took place at night. none of these objects seem to have a light of its own. they are dark, and travel as a shadow. they are not hard to find. i catch them coming in to earths atmosphere. coz like all objects that enter. they start to burn up and give off a glow. my first sighting, was in the late fall. 3 of us me my brother in law. and his brother. arrived at my home at the time. i'm guessing the time to be around 10pm. a clear night. stepping out of the car. i looked up at the night sky. the stars so bright. a few seconds looking up. i see that one star was getting brighter and brighter. then in a spilt second it was getting demi to the point it was just a faint shadow in space. it travelled on a curve to what seem to be towards the centre of the milky way galaxy.It went out and in a split second again came right back in the same trajectory. it all looked the same it came in super fast. burned up and back out to the milky way. i've never seen these in day light. i've seen them a few times here in nb where i live and a few time in alberta in different locations. they are not hard to spot. but they are hard to take pictures of. because they up so high. in ab one time on a very clean night i watched 3 objects coming in and out of planetary space. the object seem to be playing. i sometimes think they want to be seen. they were going out farther in to space. one of three was gone. so i watch the two. playing,dancing in space. a good 10mins. they were going up and down from one and other. one would go up. the other down. i couldn't understand what they were doing. if this was not other worldly beings.Then some military some where's has some pretty good capeabilltys. scare to think that. the 2 dancing objects just got so far away that they could no longer be seen. the last object i have seen like this. i watched it coming in to our atmosphere. start to burn. it's like it came straight down. getting brighter and brighter. from where i live i was looking north. it dropped in to a hight of i would say 30-60000 feet. then went nw. moving very fast. i've worked in grand cash alberta. 29km up top of a cole mine in the mountain . the nights sky so clear, so big you can see so much movement at night. you can see these ufos on any clear night. they are out there.They move so fast it makes them hard to see. you have to come up with ways to see them. you can't see them by looking in one spot you have to move your head around. from one area to and other. some times i will be looking in one direction. spin my head around and stop focus hard then catch a flash in the corner of my eye. not blinking turn to that object and watch it coming in.
content.summary: The only light coming off of the ufo was that of the sun.

content.detailedDescription: I was co pilot in a 421 cessna. the pilot and i were flying from teterborough new jersey to pontiac michigan and a giant black object flew right over us in the opposite direction. the pilot and i both witnessed it and were frozen in awe. we saw the object for roughly five minutes as it passed over us.. it was a cloudless night and the object blocked the stars from our view. after discussing it with each other we contacted the faa center we were communicating with. we asked if we just had a near mis with another aircraft. they came back to say they do have an object on radar but no transponder report. we told them it just flew within 500 feet of us and scared us. they asked if we wanted  to file a ufo report. we both looked at each other and said no. i just wanted you to have a report on file due to the fact i just saw a show about pa residents seeing them in there area. one mans description of the craft and the lightning making it visible reminded me of it. i thought i should share the fact we seen it too really high in the air! the pilot and i have talked about it several times over the years and i felt maybe it could help with something by letting you know how high we seen it. as the woman said on the show i was a non believer believer now i know for a fact they are real now. i do feel the faa knows also but don't want any problems by being a witness to what they already know exist. i have no reason to make this up. i just want to verify the facts that it was huge and flying to slow to stay in the air as far as normal flying methods. also  it made no sound.
content.summary: I was flying a airplane at 21,000 feet from nj to mi. a huge dark object flew straight over our heads and blocked out stars

content.detailedDescription: I was walking acrossed the park(old fort st) to get back to my place cause i didnt have a car at the time, i was walking with two other people who both saw the same thing. we noticed two black ops choppers flying dangerously close to eachother and they were very quiet choppers cause they were only a 50 yards away at this point heading directly our way and we could barely hear them,as they got closer you could see a object flying infront of the choppers and it was noiseless the only thing you could tell about this object is that it reflected everything so well that if the helicopters were not flying dangerously close to eachoth you wouldnt have saw this ufo.The path of all three aircrafts were headed directly over our heads as it got closer we could now notice this was not of this planet because it was noiseless. it looked like a boomerang with a football inside of it(like most reports) it had greyish silver metallic surface that reflected sound and noise cause as it got over head i yelled, what the f#$% is that and it felt like my own words blew back acrossed me as if this thing reflected noise as well as visual contact with anything it came it sight with. the object skipped more than it flew smoothly, almost like it was weaving in and out of air pockets we cant see with the naked eye. and nother this thaat happend was reported on your penn investigation with the lady who saw the sparkles fall on her tree then go back up in the ship. it was like we had the same experiace but what felt it was a part of the air craft that felt like it went threw us not sprinkles fallin on us but this stuff looked like a klocked part of the ship that physically went threw us instead of knockin us down
content.summary: Was walking in old fort park twords the road and it flew over with two block hellicopters following it

content.detailedDescription: I was going to work. 3 miles away, i stoped on the road,could not take my eyes off it.  i waited an forgot to use my cell phone to take a picture. started on my way to work as i  was driving the object got larger. i wanted to get kathy to see it. when we got out of the store the object was gone.
content.summary: Disc,4 to 6 beams coming down. very large & gray

content.detailedDescription: I was in an airplane and i was looking out the window and i seen the triangle ufo just below the airplane going ahead of us and then it disappeared it was triangle white with black on the corners in red and it was in plain sight i have the picture i will send to you get ahold of me and i will send iti've tried sending it to other people and they have not responded this is trevor years ago and i was watching tv and seen you guys so i figured i will try and let you guys tell me what it is i know it is it is a ufo
content.summary: I was on an airplane when i took this picture it was just lower than the plane in sight was awesome

content.detailedDescription: After drinking quite a bit i was standing in front of a friends house. in the past i have been a helicopter pilot and have observed many planes and helicopters durning night time flight. just before two am i noticed an object that caught my attention as somethjng strange neither a plan nor a helicopter moving at a high speed. i then took pictures and asking a friend when he came over moments later if he had seen it. i've been waiting my whole life to become a believer with concret evidence and unfortunately being as intoxicated as i was many details can't be remembered. i hope with the pictures i can get some clarification of this event.
content.summary: Fast moving bright white beam at a far distance

content.detailedDescription: One evening i was leaving my mothers home with friends in jan. my friends were waiting for me to go ice skating to our favorite outdoor rink. so as we were walking toward the maine road, we could not dismiss what we were about to see. there's a big pine tree ahead of us. as we were walking toward it, we suddenly stop and seen this 4ft. bright red glowing ball swirling around the tree. i could not believe what my eyes are seeing. this lasted for it seem for 5 min.  then as fast as it was there it disappeared .  then we all said to each other, what the heck did we just see man!!!!!!!! so we all never talked about it since then. we didn't want people to think that we were going out of our minds our on drugs or what ever. it's been a long time. i came out to talked about this. this all happened in  jan/1978. this bothered me for sometime now. so some of us need an answer on what we saw. as well as everyone on this planet!!!  thank you for letting me bring this out for all to see. a ufo watcher!!!
content.summary: A 4 foot size fire ball waving and swirling  around a large pine tree.

content.detailedDescription: I was in an airplane and i was looking out the window and i seen the triangle ufo just below the airplane going ahead of us and then it disappeared it was triangle white with black on the corners in red and it was in plain sight i have the picture i will send to you get ahold of me and i will send iti've tried sending it to other people and they have not responded this is trevor years ago and i was watching tv and seen you guys so i figured i will try and let you guys tell me what it is i know it is it is a ufo
content.summary: I was on an airplane when i took this picture it was just lower than the plane in sight was awesome

content.detailedDescription: Was in car headed home from dexter. husband says what the hay is that so everyone in the car looked and we all saw 5 very bright objects yellow/orange in sky a short distance in front of us; my husband sped up but we could not catch up with them. just as quickly as they appeared ,they disappeared. this is not the first time we have seen strange things in the sky in this area. we were all very excited, but also a bit shaken too. a friend that follows this sorta thing suggested we report the sighting.
content.summary: Driving and saw objects directly in front of us, a short distance,very bright amber color.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from greatfalls with wife and her grandmother and two kids in the back of the truck. we past valier mt about 5 miles west there is a hooderite  colony . we approached the straight way from the curve . that's when i noticed a light shining down. like a street light. i've traveled this road all my life. so i know there is no street lights there. ok we past it. i was thinking that's not right . when it appears in the passenger side window with no light shining down. so i start trying to wake up my wife. who was sitting in the middle. " wake up and look at this"!! that's when her grandma says " i see it"! i guess she always likes to watch her drivers. i have always noticed . the power lines cross at the colonies dirt road. so i pulled under them lines. i hovered above the telephone pole for about 2 min . big egg ball of light. grandma started saying her rosary. then that's when this scary feeling came over me. my back began to crawl. then the light sucked in its self back . the front seemed to touch the back. then took off with tremendous speed. it advanced 3 miles in 2 seconds. leaving a small ball of light spinning by the telephone pole. it skipped like a rock skipping over water. that's when i saw tail lights of an other car. who had to have seen it to. because they began to pick up speed. i has to travel 90 mph. to catch up to them. so i fallowed them to the bingo. it was another familiar family from town. they said that they saw it to.
content.summary: It had light shining down like street light then light retracted and and fallowed at trucks side then we stopped under crossing powerline then it sucked back in its self and flew away unnormal speed leaving small exaust ball of light sping

content.detailedDescription: I was outside a diner in eatontown n.J. when someone hollered there was a ufo. i looked up and saw 3 objects flying from about 2 miles away and moving very fast and getting higher as they came closer. they were moving in a very wide circular diection and coming closer at a very fast speed sort of one trailing the other. after reaching about half a mile away they split up with two countinuing the circular direction and returning in the direction they came from while the other one made an abrupt change of direction and shot stright up for a few hundred feet and the in what looked like no time and no space it turned and made an arc to follow where the other 2 had gone and was able to catch up to them before the got out of sight. i had watched this happen and thought that i know of nothing in this world tht can move that fast and make a dicection change that fast and in what looked like being on the same spot. then just fly all the out of sight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying object, red color, 3 objects moving in a semi-circular direction, then split up with 2 continuing the circular direction and one making a very abrut stop and extreamly fast and stright rise, then change to a fast curve to follow the others.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the  drive inn movies and didnt like the film so i was star gazing i saw a big star far behind other stars it was moving and sometimes zig zagging a little i watched it for 20 minutes then it started to get bigger i could tell it was landing i yelled at 2 friends in the car with me, they wanted to leave and go find it, it landed close by but there is a lot of land near this area and no roads, we drove for 3 hours trying to find it but couldnt.  it was near the gospel lighthouse church at loop 12 and illinois in dallas.  i am guessing it was around 1978/79 timeframe.

i wanted so bad to investigate this but at the time i didnt know who to call, so we just wrote it off as a really strange event.  i would like to know if anyone else saw this event

thanks
content.summary: I was at the movies, was watching a star from sunroof noticed it was moving strangely zig zaging then realized it was not a star after 20 minutes it was getting close so i told the other 2 occupants, they watched and we left the theater as it landed.

content.detailedDescription:
1964 late, or early 1965. no leaves on trees. cold.  owosso, mi  coming back from laundromat (lived in northern owosso, se of hospital, i think.) looked up at clear sky(evening) to see if it looked like rain so i could hang out clothes in the morning. saw a falling star just about straight up. came from way up from the stars, looked like.   fell fast, then instantly stopped about 500 ? ft up above the trees. sat there.  it was a round ball of white fuzziness with a hint of colors but not clear.  at that point it looked like the size of a small plane.  no noise.  i was facing north, it was almost directly overhead.  then it started slowly to come down at an angle kind of westerly or northwesterly.   i got so curious, i got back into the car and followed it all the way to the hospital and it came down in the swampy area behind it.  i did see another car's lights over that way coming toward town. as soon as it disappeared into the trees, i got so scared i headed home and didn't even tell my (first) husband about it for three weeks or so.  i also didn't report it even though my landlord was a city cop!  i was afraid "whatever" it was might come and get me!  we moved to lansing that next year. several years after that i heard that a couple of young guys saw it and made a report and were ridiculed. it was probably in the paper but we didn't get the newspaper back then. 
 i had a totally different kind of sighting years later up near eastport, mi
a few miles east of eastport, my daughter and i saw a silver "airplane" no wings, not a blimp, as big as an airliner but more streamlined, solid silver, hanging over a barn about 500-1000 ft away.
maybe 300 ft up?  it sat there. i stopped the car. it started to move slowly. i got out to watch it. when it got about a quarter mile away. it just "disappeared."  (i had a feeling like it was a load of tourists just watching us.) that would have been april 1987 (a tornado had hit there at that time.) i wasn't so scared this time. didn't report it but did talk about it to people.
  my current husband saw one after we moved down here to florida. on new years morning about 9:3-9:30 am, maybe 2005 or 2006.  he was on the porch looking at a "funny cloud" southeast of him. he said it was "round,"  unlike the others.  then it shot straight up and out of sight within a second or few. scared him so bad he came in shaking and didn't get over it for a long time. 
  so, now we see "reports" on tv and figure there are aliens of some kind, but not much we can do about it, so pretty much don't get bothered.  only, while one of my sightings and bob sound like the same thing, the other one that just blinked out?  i don't think that was the same kind at all!
  i have been aware of mufon and may have tried to file a report way back then about the first one but i can't remember. i do remember i sent one to that project bluebook when they were closing out. so, there are records of it somewhere.
  why wouldn't they let us know who they are?  well, when we get into beehives do we ask permission or talk to the bees at all?  probably the same thing.   
  it has given me a more open mind, though.  
but i still don't want them landing in my back yard! at 71, i'd probably have a heart attack..
(by requiring me to fill in formation i no longer remember-exact dates and times, you want me to lie? this information i have written is the right info. you need to rework the questionaire.)
content.summary: "falling star" came straight down. stopped suddenly. then came down at an angle.

content.detailedDescription: We went to vail for our aniversary and rode up the gondola, i was enjoying the day (and my beer) so i decided to take a picture and the object showed up in the picture. i didn't see it when i took the picture i noticed it later. i think it might be a fly, but i wanted to get some other opinions. i thought it was cool so i put it on facebook.
content.summary: We went to vail for our aniversary and rode up the gondola, i was enjoying the day (and my beer) so i decided to take a picture and the object showed up in the picture
